news.headline: P&G to Webcast Presentation From the Morgan Stanley Global Consumer & Retail Conference, December 2
news.summary: CINCINNATI, November 25, 2025--Andre Schulten, Chief Financial Officer of The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) will be a featured speaker at the Morgan Stanley Global Consumer & Retail Conference on Tuesday, December 2, 2025 at 8:45 A.M. Eastern Time (ET).

news.headline: Procter & Gamble Stock: Is PG Underperforming the Consumer Defensive Sector?
news.summary: Procter & Gamble is lagging behind the consumer defensive sector, but Wall Street analysts remain optimistic about the stock.
